policies.value: MVC architecture is mandatory with strict separation of concerns.
Backend: NestJS (TypeScript), PostgreSQL with TypeORM. Frontend: NextJS (TypeScript), Material UI, HTML, CSS.
Apply the least privileged principle across all layers.
Use JWT for authentication with short-lived access tokens and long-lived refresh tokens stored in secure HttpOnly cookies.
RESTful, resource-oriented APIs with URL format: /api/v1/<resource> using lowercase, kebab-case, plural nouns.
JWT-based authentication with access and refresh tokens stored securely.
Databases must follow minimum 3NF normalization unless explicitly documented.
MVC architecture is mandatory with strict separation of concerns.
Follow NestJS Coding Standards & Best Practices.
Follow Material UI Best Practices & Guidelines.
